data.title: CHRIS GARNEAU
data.meta_description: Throughout his career, Chris Garneau has explored a wide breadth of sonic territory. "Yours", his previous studio album (2018), was an expansive world of many textures, one that showcased his prowess as a composer and his ability to create rich sensory landscapes. With "The Kind"
